  2. The mysterious button on the Nintendo Switch 2 Joy-Con has finally been revealed – it's a C, and fans are desperately trying to figure out what it's for: "Either Community or Connect"  Yahoo
  3. Nintendo is launching a news app  The Verge
  4. Nintendo Today! app will provide updates on games, events and the Switch 2  Engadget
  5. Nintendo Switch 2 Joy-Con Controller C Button Will Allow System to Connect to the Original Switch to Use as Second Screen – Rumor  Wccftech

item.title: Report: Xbox games on PlayStation sales data suggests a very mixed picture - Windows Central
item.description:
1. Report: Xbox games on PlayStation sales data suggests a very mixed picture  Windows Central
  2. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle PS5 Release Date Trailer Sees Uncharted's Nolan North Accept Indy's Troy Baker Into an 'Exclusive Club' of Adventure Games on PlayStation  IGN
  3. Uncharted fans lose it over surprise PlayStation trailer  GAMINGbible
  4. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Review - Worthy Of A Museum  Game Informer
  5. Indiana Jones And The Great Circle PS5 Edition Preorders Are Live, Including A Collector's Edition  GameSpot
